Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a string telephone that connects two students to show how they communicate over a distance.
The student can use visual elements in the drawing to indicate that the device uses sound to send and receive information.
The student can include labels or captions explaining that the device helps people communicate over long distances.
The student can depict people using the string telephone to illustrate the device's practical use.
The student can represent the importance of technology in communication by showing how life could be different without it.
